posts.title: My First Post
posts.body: By going through these steps, you should be able to identify and fix the problem. Let me know if you need more specific help!

posts.title: My 2nd post
posts.body: Trace the flow of your code and find out where the variable might be getting an unexpected value. Use console.log statements to log the value of the variable before the error occurs.

posts.title: Default Values:
posts.body: If applicable, provide default values for variables to avoid them being undefined.
